concept.description: Markiert Klassen, die das Interface "de.bund.bva.pliscommon.batchrahmen.batch.rahmen.BatchAusfuehrungsBean" implementieren, mit "Batch:AusfuehrungsBean".
concept.cypher: MATCH (batchBean:Type)-[:IMPLEMENTS*]->(batchAusfuehrungsBean:Type) WHERE batchAusfuehrungsBean.fqn = "de.bund.bva.pliscommon.batchrahmen.batch.rahmen.BatchAusfuehrungsBean" AND NOT EXISTS(batchBean.abstract) SET batchBean:Batch:AusfuehrungsBean RETURN batchBean AS BatchBean UNION MATCH (batchBean:Type)-[:EXTENDS*]->(:Type)-[:IMPLEMENTS*]->(batchAusfuehrungsBean:Type) WHERE batchAusfuehrungsBean.fqn = "de.bund.bva.pliscommon.batchrahmen.batch.rahmen.BatchAusfuehrungsBean" AND NOT EXISTS(batchBean.abstract) SET batchBean:Batch:AusfuehrungsBean RETURN batchBean as BatchBean

constraint.description: Eine Ausführungsbean darf keine Transaktionen starten oder beenden.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (batchBean:AusfuehrungsBean)-[:DECLARES]->(methode:Method), ()-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(annotationType:Type) WHERE ((batchBean)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(annotationType) OR (methode)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(annotationType)) AND annotationType.fqn = "org.springframework.transaction.annotation.Transactional" RETURN DISTINCT batchBean.name AS BatchAusfuehrungsBeanMitTransactional

constraint.description: Analog zu den Anwendungsfällen werden Batchklassen mit dem Präfix "Bat" gekennzeichnet.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (:Layer {name: "batch"})-[:CONTAINS]->(t:Type) WHERE NOT t.name STARTS WITH "Bat" RETURN t.name AS BatchOhneBatPraefix
